item.title: Deloitte 2018 ML Guild Hackathon
item.description: View this project on Github Background Every year the Deloitte Machine Learning Guild hosts an their annual hackathon, which is the largest Data Science / ML hackathon of its kind within Deloitte. Interested folks form teams of 2-4 people and work on the assigned hackathon theme for a duration of 2-4 weeks, after which the teams are judged based on a variety of criteria. The judges are Deloite ML Guild Masters who are subject matter experts in ML and DS, as well as partners who are interested in the field.
